title: Two hours of christmas cartoons
creator_credit: Hughes Leisure Group and Music World
brief_description: A compilation of cartoons from the forties and fifties which feature classic stories such as ‘Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer’, ‘Santa’s surprise’, ‘Jingle bell foolin’, ‘Christmas circus’ and a host of other titles guaranteed to generate lots of Christmas spirit.
